an4.139:4.1: * “Cattārome, bhikkhave, dhammakathikā.
an4.139:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko appañca bhāsati asahitañca;
an4.139:4.4: parisā cassa na kusalā hoti sahitāsahitassa.
an4.139:4.5: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarūpāya parisāya dhammakathikotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
an4.139:5.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko appañca bhāsati sahitañca;
an4.139:5.3: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarūpāya parisāya dhammakathikotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
an4.139:6.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko bahuñca bhāsati asahitañca;
an4.139:6.2: parisā cassa na kusalā hoti sahitāsahitassa.
an4.139:6.3: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarūpāya parisāya dhammakathikotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
an4.139:7.1: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco dhammakathiko bahuñca bhāsati sahitañca;
an4.139:7.3: Evarūpo, bhikkhave, dhammakathiko evarūpāya parisāya dhammakathikotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
